entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 04:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
